pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, September 3, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, September 3 2016:

Hangzhou, People’s Republic of China

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Hangzhou, People’s Republic of China

Hangzhou Xiaoshan International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Jack Ma, Founder and Executive Chairman of the Alibaba Group

Alibaba Xixi Campus
960 Wenyi West Road
Hangzhou, China

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks

Alibaba Xixi Campus
960 Wenyi West Road
Hangzhou, China

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability              

Alibaba Xixi Campus
960 Wenyi West Road
Hangzhou, China

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the B20 Panel Discussion “Breaking a New Path for Global Economic Growth”

Note for media:

  •  Pooled photo opportunity only


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
